div:
Leaves petiolate (proximally) or sessile (distally, weakly clasping and gradually reduced); blades oblong or lanceolate,
3.5-35+ cm x 5-35 mm QUANTITY
,
1-2-pinnately QUANTITY
lobed (ultimate lobes Â± lanceolate, often arrayed in multiple planes), faces glabrate to sparsely tomentose or densely lanate.
